events.name: Joint Meetup (with Cloud Native + Container Devs) - Containers/K8S/Serverless

venue.name: Google India Pvt. Ltd
venue.address_1: No. 3, RMZ Infinity - Tower E 4th Floor Old Madras Road Bangalore, 560 016 Landmark: Opposite Gopalan Signature Mall

events.description:
This is a joint meetup with "Cloud Native" and "Container Developers" group.

The meetup is focused on Server-less (Cloud Functions), So we will be having a talk on Server-less/Cloud Functions followed by Hands-On-Lab. Target Audience are "Beginners", so basic understanding of Containers are the only prerequisite.

We also have a special talk from "Hasura" about their "GraphQL Engine".

Agenda:
------------
9:00-9:30 : Registration

9:30-10:15 : A blazing-fast, highly scalable application with GraphQL, Kubernetes and Serverless (cloud functions) using Hasura by Tanmai Gopal (Co-Founder, Hasura.io)

10:15-11:00 : Introduction to Serverless and Google Cloud Functions by Malepati Bala Siva Sai Akhil (Technical Project Leader, Huawei)

11:00-11:15 : Break
11:15-1:00 : Hands-On-Lab

Important Note:
----------------------
Since we have limited seats for Hands-on-Lab, RSVP on this meetup doesn't guarantee the seat, please fill this Google Form and submit.

https://goo.gl/forms/YzZwtUUyMxnWhOA23

Last date for RSVP & Google Form Submission is 09th July. Seat Confirmation will be notified by 10th July through Email.

Also Please bring your Laptop for "Hands-On-Lab"

Prerequisite:
------------------
Basic understanding of Containers.

events.name: Google Cloud Next’18 Extended : Bangalore

venue.name: Google India Private Limited-Bangalore
venue.address_1: No 3, RMZ Infinity, Tower E, Old Madras Road, Bangalore, KA, 560 016

events.description:
Google Cloud Next’18 (https://cloud.withgoogle.com/next18/sf/) is the annual developer festival at Google, and we're hosting one here in Bangalore at Google office as an Extended event!

So join GCDC Bangalore for our yearly remote viewing party of Google Cloud Next'18, which include Dinner followed by Keynote Live-Streaming.

Google Cloud Keynote (Live-Streaming):
--------------------------------------------------------
Hear from Google Cloud leaders about how the cloud is transforming business, making Artificial Intelligence available to everyone, and improving the lives and circumstances of people around the world in ways never before possible.
https://cloud.withgoogle.com/next18/sf/sessions/session/219898

Agenda:
-----------
8:00-8:30 PM - Registration
8:30-9:30 PM - Dinner
9:[masked] PM - Google Cloud Keynote (Live Streaming)

Important Note:
----------------------
- This is an invite only event and registration is compulsory in the form below.
- Since we have limited seats, RSVPing the meetup would not guarantee an invite so do ensure you fill this registration form:

https://goo.gl/forms/oJPdWrQhCiUHK6gO2

- We will send Invitation Email by 23rd July[masked] PM (IST).
- In case any queries, you can reach out to me directly on my mobile: [masked] (Akash Agrawal)

events.name: Meetup #3 (CloudNative - joint meetup Google Cloud Community + Container Devs)

venue.name: IBM India Pvt Ltd
venue.address_2: 6th Floor, Manyata Tech Park, Nagawara Outer Ring Road,

events.description:
-- This is a FREE meetup --

Please DO NOT RSVP, instead fill this form to help us plan for better logistics - https://docs.google.com/forms/d/18gu7pYgGLx2nm0CqhrTOsM4WJ5ppE5HDZMB_cfIlMbs

Glad to announce another edition of Cloud Native event on 8th September which will be a joint meetup with Google Cloud Developer Community, Bangalore and Container Developers.

First session would be from IBM where we would get to hear insights from a container expert on upcoming workload isolation and encryption technologies in container ecosystem

Second session would be from Bridgei2i who would walk-through the techniques involved in getting your C++ code run in a serverless manner with Google Cloud Functions.

Please bring your fully charged laptop along for the hands-on online lab.

Agenda:
9:30 AM to 10:00 AM - Registration

10:00 AM to 10:45 AM - Secure Containers, Harshal Patil, Technical Lead, IBM
Q&A (10 mins)

10:55 AM to 11:40 AM - C++ the serverless way with Cloud Functions, Runcy Oommen, Cloud Architect, Bridgei2i
Q&A (10 mins)

11:50 AM to 12:15 PM - Break

12:15 PM to 1:00 PM - Hands-on lab session

A BIG thanks to IBM India for hosting this meetup event.

events.name: Global Digital Conference
events.description:
******* IMP NOTE:
1. This is an online event and hence RSVPs have been disabled. Please register at the link provided and attend online.
2. Please note that GCDC, Bengaluru is NOT organizing the event
*******

Hello folks,
Join us on January 24 for Google Cloud’s app development conference - Better Code, Faster, a free global online event where you can learn about the tools that experts and innovators are using to create apps that are scalable, resilient, and secure with shorter development cycles. Hear about the future of app development in our keynote featuring Pali Bhat, VP of Product Management, Google Cloud, and then dive deeper in the breakout sessions.

Connect with and learn from the experts live online
Have your questions answered with live Q&A sessions, and see our interactive demos.

Receive Complimentary Qwiklab Access.
Register now - https://cloudonair.withgoogle.com/events/app-dev%20 - take advantage of one-month free access to Qwiklab’s hands-on training.

See you in the cloud,
Google Cloud Developer Community, Bengaluru

venue.name: BRIDGEi2i Analytics Solutions
venue.address_1: Umiya Business Bay, Tower 2, 2nd Floor,Cessna Business Park, Kadubeesanahalli,Outer Ring Road

events.description:
-- This is a FREE meetup --

All,
We are hosting our next meetup as "Cloud Study Jam" focused on "AI/ML & GCP". This Study Jam contains Sessions & Hands on Lab both.

You can find agenda below:

- Registration

- Session-1 : BigQuery Session
- Lab-1 : Introduction to SQL for BigQuery and Cloud SQL
- Lab-2 : BigQuery: Qwik Start - Console

- Session-2 : Natural Language API/Speech API
- Lab-3 : Cloud Natural Language API: Qwik Start
- Lab-4 : Google Cloud Speech API: Qwik Start

- Session-3 : Cloud ML
- Lab-5 : Cloud ML Engine: Qwik Start

events.name: Meetup #6 - Cloud Study Jam - 2 (Advanced AI/ML)

venue.name: BRIDGEi2i Analytics Solutions
venue.address_1: Umiya Business Bay, Tower 2, 2nd Floor,Cessna Business Park, Kadubeesanahalli,Outer Ring Road

events.description:
-- This is a FREE meetup --

Please DO NOT RSVP on meetup page, instead fill this form: https://goo.gl/forms/CZx6LXWbid6SDurX2
You can join the waiting list to get updates.

Study Jams are community-run study groups for developers. This is a great opportunity to bring members of the community together to learn something in person.
This meetup will be focused on "AI/ML". This Study Jam contains Sessions & Hands on Lab both.

Agenda:

Registration

Session 1:
Lab-1 : Introduction to APIs in Google
Lab-2 : Extract, Analyze, and Translate Text from Images with the Cloud ML APIs

Session 2:
Lab-3 : Entity and Sentiment Analysis with the Natural Language API
Lab-4 : Classify Text into Categories with the Natural Language API

Session 3:
Lab-5 : Awwvision: Cloud Vision API from a Kubernetes Cluster
Lab-6 : Implementing an AI Chatbot with Dialogflow

About the facilitators:

1. Ramjee Ganti
Seasoned technology professional, Entrepreneur, with experience across domains spanning telecom, advertising, e-commerce, analytics, fintech. Have built and led teams that built scalable systems on cloud. Currently working on building products in the data and machine learning space.
Company: Datalicious
Contact: https://www.linkedin.com/in/gantir/

2. Rajesh Hegde
Experienced across e-commerce, media publishing, personal finance, web analytics, digital advertising domains and acquiring knowledge on machine learning models and Deep Net techniques. A Technology Evangelist and a Google Cloud Certified Professional Data Engineer.
Company: Datalicious
Contact: https://www.linkedin.com/in/rajeshphegde/

events.name: Cloud OnBoard OnAir
events.description:
******* IMP NOTE:
1. This is an online event and hence RSVPs have been disabled. Please register at the link provided and attend online.
2. Please note that GCDC, Bengaluru is NOT organizing the event
*******

Hi there,
You are invited to participate in Cloud OnBoard OnAir, a half-day live-stream technical training event that will cover core infrastructure fundamentals on Google Cloud Platform. This training will help you get started with cloud services such as:
--> Compute Engine
--> Storage and Datastore
--> Container Engine
--> Kubernetes Engine
--> App Engine

This free to attend half-day online event will be delivered by our leading instructors using presentations and demonstrations. You will be provided with industry best practices and tips to further your learning and ability to build with the Google Cloud Platform.

Join us to accelerate your career with GCP by registering using the link - https://goo.gl/HQEN3C

See you in the cloud,
Google Cloud Developer Community (GCDC), Bengaluru

events.name: DevFest Bangalore 2019 (Day 1)
events.description:
(Visit http://gdgbangalore.com for updates)
*** IMP NOTE: We won't be accepting RSVP's for DevFest, the tickets are available on the website ***

Google Cloud Developer Community (GCDC), Google Developers Group (GDG) and Women Tech Makers (WTM) Bangalore are proud to announce the DevFest Bangalore 2019 which is the biggest Google related event in Bangalore by GDG community!
The event is set to take place on September 21st and 22nd 2019.

DevFest is large, community -run events happening around the globe focused on community building and learning about Google technologies. The speakers and the content are carefully curated matching the set standards of the tech era.

This year’s DevFest will be a gala for the developer community. It will consist of activities catering to the professional and the lateral crowd.

i. Speaker Sessions
ii. Workshops
iii. Pannel Discussions
iv. Startup connect
events.how_to_find_us: You have to reach Gate No 10 of Infosys, Electronic City, Bangalore. There would be car/bike parking available along with a registration desk and security checks before entry to the campus

events.name: Meetup #10 - Architecture Focus on GCP
events.description:
** For working professionals ONLY. Students NOT allowed **

-- This is a FREE meetup --
Please DO NOT RSVP at the meetup page, instead fill this form - https://forms.gle/fGhBmjtBBQrxTNbS7 - to help us plan for better logistics

We're super excited to host a special meetup focused around GCP architecture.

Our first speaker is Kevin Nelson, who is a Staff Developer Advocate on GCP (expertise on Architecture and SAP integration) based out of Los Angeles. His session would focus around generic GCP architecture and as to what makes GCP different (and hopefully interesting) compared to other cloud providers. The session would also expand upon CloudRun which is a great new service with broad applications. Talk would conclude with a session on AutoML which will be a fun talk that shows how developers can build custom machine learning models without having to become Machine Learning and TensorFlow experts

Our second speaker of the day is Sathish VJ who has all the GCP technical certifications under his belt. The focus of his talk would be to provide the required tips and tricks to prepare for the Professional Cloud Architect (PCA) certification exam.

Here's the tentative agenda:
9:30 AM - 10:00 AM : Welcome and Registration
10:00 AM - 11:30 AM : Session by Kevin Nelson
11:30 AM - 11:45 AM : Q & A
11:45 AM - 12:30 PM : Session by Sathish VJ
12:30 PM - 01:00 PM : Snacks/Refreshments/Networking

upcoming.name: Google Cloud Community Day 2019
upcoming.description:
** For working professionals ONLY. Students NOT allowed **

-- This is a FREE event --
Please DO NOT RSVP at the meetup page, instead fill this form to help us plan for better logistics: https://docs.google.com/forms/d/e/1FAIpQLSc5w0G0uuK_sOlmZ6cc1X-DGdWMpqzllLvc1JFUIn8xB5vEVQ/viewform

We're super excited to host our annual event "Google Cloud Community Day, Bengaluru" on 03rd Dec 2019.
We would like to invite all passionate developers who are interested to learn Google Cloud Platform, related Technologies & use cases. We will have amazing speakers featuring Developer Advocates, Customer Engineers from Google, Google Developer Experts (GDEs) & prominent Speakers from the developer community speaking about the Google Cloud Platform.

[UPDATE]
We have 4 confirmed speakers from Google:

- Ankur Kotwal (Developer Advocate, Google)
- Dave Elliott (Developer Advocate, Google)
- Yoshi Yamaguchi (Developer Advocate, Google)
- Rishi Singhal (Customer Engineer, Google)

We are working on finalising remaining speakers, topics, agenda & will announce it soon.

Venue: Taj MG Road, Bengaluru

Important Note:
- Filling RSVP form doesn't guarantee seat reservation, we will send separate confirmation email by end of November.
- Since this event is focused for working professionals, we encourage you to RSVP through official work email id.

- CFP for Google Cloud Community Day is open & available here: https://docs.google.com/forms/d/e/1FAIpQLSdq4H-747EFJzZW9Dg1S9_1ofsRzGLjTde2beXocse8Us7QXw/viewform
